Oodle Finance | Senior Full Stack Java Developer | Oxford, UK | ONSITE https://oodle-finance.workable.com/jobs

We now have the need for a Senior Full Stack Java Developer to join our growing Systems team. Reporting directly to the CTO, you will be the Technical Lead on our core underwriting system, Oodle Core. This will involve any development including third party inputs, such as credit referencing and ID checking systems, as well as working with internal teams such as underwriting and risk.

You will need experience in the following:

At least 4+ years of professional java experience (Java 8 would be great). Experience with web application development SOA Eclipse or similar java IDE Databases â€“ both SQL databases (e.g. Postgres) and NoSQL databases (e.g. mongoDB) Web services (Json, Soap, RESTful) Linux SQL databases and NoSQL databases Python JavaScript Git Ideally you will have experience with RabbitMQ and AWS. You will have a strong ability to communicate effectively both internally and externally, and to lead projects in a rapidly growing and demanding environment.
